title: Vim Tipp #2
text:
Liste

fruits

apples

macintosh
red delicious

pears
peaches

vegetables

broccoli
chard oder so.


See the Tabelle.

A paragraph with big text.

This is text with special formatting.







G

  

run

 run   

intr

 intr   

run–intr

   

kernel

 kernel   

run–kernel

   

runbl

 runbl   

intr–runbl

   

runbl–run

   

zombie

 zombie   

kernel–zombie

   

sleep

 sleep   

kernel–sleep

   

runmem

 runmem   

kernel–runmem

   

sleep–runmem

   

swap

 swap   

sleep–swap

   

runswap

 runswap   

swap–runswap

   

runswap–runmem

   

new

 new   

runswap–new

   

new–runmem

title: Vim Tipp #2
text:
Fußnoten


Inline notes are easier to write, since you don’t have to pick an identifier and move down to type the note.↩︎
Here is the associated footnote, which will appear at the bottom of my document in a “Footnotes” section.↩︎

title: Vim Tipp #1
text:
Vim Plugins installieren mit:
mkdir -p ~/.vim/pack/plugins/start
cd ~/.vim/pack/plugins/start
git clone https://plugins.io/vim/foo.git
Helpfile erstellen mit:
vim -u NONE -c "helptags foo/doc" -c q

title: Tablet oder Phone als externes Display unter Ubuntu nutzen
text:
Funktion muss mit
gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.remote-desktop.rdp screen-share-mode extend
im Terminal aktiviert werden.
Dann unter Settings/Sharing RDP aktivieren.
Auf externem Gerät muss MS RDP App installiert werden.
